document_data.name: Space Guppy
document_data.mainbody: '''Space guppies''' were [[fish]]-like creatures that "swam" through the vast expanses of [[Wildspace]] and the [[Astral Plane]].
document_data.Abilities: They could form a small [[air envelope]] that supported breathing for themself and one other tiny creature.
document_data.Personality:
[[File:Chwinga astronaut 5e.jpg|thumb|right|''A space chwinga fisher riding atop its guppy''.]]
By all appearances, they seemed to be rather friendly.<ref name="LOX-p47>
document_data.Combat: Despite their innocent nature, they were not entirely defenseless. Space guppies could easily slap at predators with their fishy tails.
document_data.Ecology: On some occasions, space guppies were taken on as mounts by space-faring [[chwinga]]s, [[sprite]]s, and other tiny creatures from across the planes.
document_data.Notable Space Guppies: * Cilia, the space guppy mount of the chwinga named Poe.
